Items.interactionText: Press [Left Click] to turn off    Hold and move horizontally [Right Click] to change the frequency
Hold and move horizontally [Left Click] to rotate the wheel. (First value to the right, second value to the left)
Press [Left Click] to place the picture
Press [Left Click] to place a pin
Press [Tab] to exit   [Right Click] to flip
Press [Left Click] to interact   Hold [Right Click] to rotate   [W] [S] to zoom in/out   Press [Esc] to exit
Hold [Right Click] to rotate   [W] [S] to zoom in/out   Press [Esc] to exit
Hold [Left Click] to move   Press [Esc] to exit
